column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: mebɛma ayɛ dɛ Nyame wɔ Farao enyim; na wo nua Aaron bɛyɛ wo nkɔnhyɛnyi."

column2: "Ɔwo bɛka dza mehyɛ wo nyinara: na wo nua Aaron bɛka akyerɛ Farao ma ɔaama Israelmba efi n’asaase do akɔ."
"Na mibepirim Farao n’akoma
column3: na mama me nsɛnkyerɛdze nye m’anwanwadze adɔɔ so wɔ Egypt asaase do."

column2: "Na Farao rinntsie hom
column3: na medze me nsa bɔto Egypt do
column6: mefi Egypt asaase do wɔ atsɛmbu akɛse mu."

column2: "Na sɛ metsen me nsa wɔ Egypt do na miyi Israelmba fi hɔn mu fir a
column3: nna Egyptfo bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Na Moses nye Aaron yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ hɔn no ara."
"Aber a wɔkasaa kyerɛɛ Farao no
column3: nna Moses edzi mfe eduowɔtwe

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye Aaron dɛ
column5: Hom nyi hom anwanwadze bi nkyerɛ a
column8: na tow kyen famu wɔ Farao enyim

column2: "Na Moses nye Aaron kɔr Farao nkyɛn
column3: na wɔyɛɛ dɛm
column4: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛe no: na Aaron toow no poma kyeen famu wɔ Farao enyim nye no nkowaa enyim

column2: "Nna Farao so frɛfrɛɛ enyansafo no
column3: na abayifo no: na hɔn so

column2: "Na hɔn nyinara totoow hɔn mpoma guu famu
column3: na ɔdandaan mbowatsena: na Aaron no poma no memeen hɔn mpoma no."

column2: "Na Farao n’akoma pirimii
column3: na oenntsie hɔn; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE kae no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Farao n’akoma epirim

column2: "Kɔ Farao nkyɛn ampa: hwɛ
column3: orupue akɔ nsu mu: na ɔwo kegyina esutsen no no nkɔnkɔnoa hɔ hyia no; na poma no a ɔdaan abowatsena no fa kitsa wo nsamu."

column2: "Na se no dɛ
column3: EWURADZE
column5: na ɔasoma me wo hɔ dɛ
column6: Ma me man nkɔ nkɔsom me wɔ sar no do: na

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column3: Iyi mu na ibohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE: Hwɛ
column4: medze poma a ɔdze me nsamu yi mobɔbɔ esutsen yi mu nsu

column2: "Na nam a wɔwɔ esutsen no mu bowuwu
column3: na esutsen no bɔbɔn; na Egyptfo bekyir dɛ wɔbɔnom esutsen no mu nsu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Se Aaron dɛ
column5: na tsen wo nsa wɔ Egypt esuesu do
column9: ma ɔndandan bɔgya; na bɔgya bɛba Egypt asaase nyinara do
column10: ndua esupi nye abo esupi nyina mu."

column2: "Na Moses nye Aaron yɛɛ dɛm
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛe no; na ɔmaa poma no do
column4: na ɔdze bɔɔ nsu a ɔwɔ esutsen no mu no wɔ Farao enyim
column5: nye no nkowaa enyim; na nsu a ɔwɔ esutsen no mu nyinara daan bɔgya."

column2: "Na nam a wɔwɔ esutsen no mu wuwui
column3: na esutsen no bɔnee
column4: na Egyptfo enntum annom esutsen no mu nsu; na bɔgya no baa Egypt asaase nyinara do."

column2: "Na Egypt akɔmfo no dze hɔn nkaber no yɛɛ dɛmara: na Farao n’akoma pirimii
column3: na oenntsie hɔn; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE kae no."

column2: "Na Farao daan noho na ɔkɔr ne fie
column3: na ɔammfa iyi so mpo annto n’akoma mu."

column2: "Na Egyptfo nyina tutuu amona wɔ esutsen no ho dɛ wobenya nsu anom; osiandɛ wonntum nnom esutsen no mu nsu."
"Na EWURADZE bɔɔ esutsen no ekyir no
column3: nda esuon botwaa mu."
